name: DEALMAKER.COM
overview:
Autodynamic Pricing Solutions are providers of the world’s only fully automatic sales negotiation protocols for commercial commodities such as new computers, new automobiles, travel packaging, grocery shopping, etc. These products all have one thing in common. Multi variable configurations.

DealMaker is a live market which works much like a stock exchange, but for negotiating B2O (build-to-order) transactions, such as new cars, computers, travel or even a basket of groceries; not simply between a single buyer and seller, but between thousands of players simultaneously. Industry leading technology includes auto-dynamic pricing and fully automatic negotiation protocols. Many orders have thousands of possible configurations, and competitive pricing. Negotiating both price and options can be a daunting task. Now for the first time you can negotiate any variation of any product, between thousands of buyers and sellers simultaneously; and by continuously adjusting the most optimal price to volume ratios DealMaker can maintain a superior balance between supply and demand. Thus returning the best price the market can bear.

Automotive OEM’s and dealers face 5 critical problems for selling new cars over the Internet. Consumer demand is not one of them. Over 90% of car buyers shop online. Over 50% would prefer to buy online. DealMaker has the most complete solution, including a patented auto-dynamic pricing engine; a multiple bid/offer negotiation protocol; an infinitely variable deal configurator; an automatic buy/sell matching engine; a multi brand deal comparison engine; and real-time market intelligence.

The company has now fully developed its product and its revenue model; so is now seeking established technology partners and investors to expand and share this unique opportunity to improve the way the world does business. Key executives are available for demo or discussion in London UK, Atlanta GA, Boca Raton FL, and online.
